title: Mother's Recipes: A Contemporary Collection of Family Treasures
features: Mother's "classic" recipes as well as easy family favorites mix well with "mother" stories, quotes about mothers and editor's stories about growing up with homecooked meals. All recipes use ingredients on hand and reflect the way people enjoy cooking today. Author, Barbara C. Jones has 7 cookbook titles with sales over 300,000 books. Artist, Pati Bannister, is world renowned for capturing the moment and mood of a special world where flowers in full bloom, richly textured fabrics, the sheen of oriental porcelains or the natural beauty of a sunlit landscape, suggest the importance of and need for beauty in the real world.
description: "Absolutely delicious recipes! Homecookin' made easy and so good, good, good!!! --
"The Creamy Macaroni and Cheese is just like my grandmother made! All of the recipes are easy to follow and made with ingredients on hand. What more can you ask for?! --
store: Sheryn R. Jones (Author),  Barbara C. Jones (Author)
